text: Sara Bahrami is an Iranian actress, born on 19 September 1982 in Isfahan, Iran. Her debut was in Parvaneh TV series displayed in Iran's TV in 2013. She also took part in another TV series entitled PardeNeshin (2015) which made her more and more known in Iranian society. Born in the central Iranian city of Isfahan, Sara Bahrami has studied Theater at university. She won Crystal Simorgh in 2018 as the best actress in a leading role, and in 2019 she won the best actress award at the Persian Film Festival. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Isfahan Category:1983 births Category:Living people
title: Sara Bahrami
